summary: Iteration 12 testing for BLVX Branding & Launch Polish features. Backend API tests: 11/11 passed (100%). Frontend UI tests: All critical flows working. Landing page displays correctly with dark background, visible BLVX logo (80px height), OG meta tags for social sharing, PWA manifest.json with display:standalone, and Sign In/Create Account buttons work correctly.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/health returns healthy status
Backend: POST /api/seed-starter-posts endpoint exists and responds
Backend: POST /api/seed-starter-posts returns seeded=false when posts exist (95+ posts)
Backend: GET /manifest.json accessible with correct PWA config (display:standalone)
Backend: manifest.json has correct icon sizes (192x192, 512x512)
Backend: index.html contains OG meta tags (og:title, og:description, og:image, og:type)
Backend: index.html contains Twitter card meta tags
Backend: index.html links to manifest.json
Backend: /assets/logo-white.png accessible (200 status)
Backend: /assets/logo-icon.png accessible (200 status)
Backend: Feed endpoint correctly requires authentication (401)
Frontend: Landing page loads with dark background (rgb(0,0,0))
Frontend: BLVX logo visible with data-testid='landing-logo' (80px height)
Frontend: Create Account button (data-testid='signup-btn') works
Frontend: Sign In button (data-testid='login-btn') works
Frontend: Google login button (data-testid='google-login-btn') present
Frontend: Signup form displays with all fields (name, email, password, submit)
Frontend: Login form displays with all fields (email, password, submit, forgot-password-link)
Frontend: force-dark CSS class maintains dark background on all auth views
Frontend: Page title is 'BLVX'
Frontend: OG tags present - title: BLVX, description: culture-native network, image: hosted on emergentagent CDN
critical_code_review_comments: Landing page correctly uses force-dark class to ensure dark background regardless of theme setting
Logo sizes are appropriate: h-16/h-20 on landing (80px), h-9 in Header, h-12 in Sidebar
OG meta tags properly configured with absolute image URL from emergentagent CDN
PWA manifest.json has correct display:standalone for app-like experience
Seed endpoint correctly checks for existing posts before seeding (idempotent operation)

test_credentials.note: No authentication required for landing page tests

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created. Database already has 95+ posts.

mocked_apis.notes: All tests use real endpoints. No mocked APIs.

context_for_next_testing_agent: Branding & Launch Polish features verified. Landing page: LandingPage.jsx with force-dark class, logo at h-16/h-20, buttons with data-testid attributes. OG tags in public/index.html with emergentagent CDN image. PWA manifest at public/manifest.json with display:standalone. Seed endpoint at /api/seed-starter-posts returns seeded=false when posts exist. Logo assets at /assets/logo-white.png and /assets/logo-icon.png.
